notes: Most accurate MSX emulator; surpassed blueMSX in accuracy; supports Palcom LaserDisc games
Inactive project since 2009; cycle-accurate with very high compatibility
RetroArch core; requires Databases and Machines folders from full blueMSX installation
Multi-system emulator with MSX2+ support via software lists

column12: Based on blueMSX; paid app on Google Play; supports SCC and FM sound
